headline: Anatomy of a Targeted Ransomware Attack
keywords: DDoS, Ransom Attack, Attacks, Ransom DDoS, RDDoS
description: Imagine your most critical systems suddenly stop operating. And then someone demands a ransom to get your systems working again. Or someone launches a DDoS against you and demands a ransom to make it stop.  Thatâ€™s the world of ransomware and ransom DDoS.
